definitions.title: taste, judgement, command
definitions.body: (BH [[טַ֫עַס]] (late sense));—abs. ´[[ט]]: Da 3:10 +, cstr. ´[[ט]]: Da 5:2, Ezr 6:14, [[טַ֫עַס]] (of God, mere scribal distinction Nö:LCB 1896, 305 Str:§ 8 c K:Aramaismen 40) Ezr 6:14, Ezr 7:23; emph. [[טַעְמָא]] Ezr 4:21;—†
Da 5:2 in the taste of the wine (while they were enjoying it). †

judgement, discretion, in reply, ´[[הֲתִיב עֵטָא וּט]]: Da 2:14 (Pr 26:16); in act (pers.) [[על]] ´[[שִׂים ט]]: Da 3:12, Da 6:14 (Pr 26:16); in act (pers.) [[על]]´[[שִׂים ט]]: Da 3:12, Da 6:14 shew proper deference to ([[עַל]]). †

command, of God Ezr 6:14, Ezr 7:23, of king Ezr 6:14; ´[[שִׂיס ט]]: give command, issue decree Da 3:10 + 3 t., Ezr 4:19, Ezr 4:21, Ezr 4:21 + 11 t.; ´[[בְּעֵל ט]]: commander Ezr 4:8, Ezr 4:9, Ezr 4:17.
